Hi,

I am using Heritrix 1.14.3 within NetArchiveSuite, and the software st=
ores
crawl reports for analysis : hosts-report.txt, basically anything
*-re=
port.txt.

I have noticed that Heritrix reports a "FINISHED" status even wh=
ile some
reports are still not finished to be created, so we ended up missi=
ng some of
these reports. I have programmed a workaround within NetArchive =
Suite,
however it doesn't always work.

Having read the release notes of He=
ritrix 1.14.4, I would like some extra
explanation on fix https://webarchiv=
e.jira.com/browse/HER-1756. Can I assume
that when Heritrix transitions fro=
m status "FINISHING" to "FINISHED" all
these reports have been generated? I=
f not is there a reliable way to test
this?

Best regards,

-- 
Nicolas Gir=
aud

nale de France

Hi,<br><br>I am using Heritrix 1.14.3 within NetArchiveSuite, and the softw=
are stores crawl reports for analysis : hosts-report.txt, basically anythin=
g *-report.txt. <br><br>I have noticed that Heritrix reports a "FINISH=
ED" status even while some reports are still not finished to be create=
d, so we ended up missing some of these reports. I have programmed a workar=
ound within NetArchive Suite, however it doesn't always work. <br>
<br>=

xplanation on fix <a href=3D"https://webarchive.jira.com/browse/HER-1756">h=
ttps://webarchive.jira.com/browse/HER-1756</a>. Can I assume that when Heri=
trix transitions from status "FINISHING" to "FINISHED" =

st this?<br>
